name: FinDeDupe
description: FinDeDupe is a comprehensive duplicate media detection and management plugin for Jellyfin. It intelligently identifies duplicate movies and TV series using advanced title normalization, fuzzy matching algorithms, and provider ID validation. Features include configurable exclusion rules, dry-run mode for safe operation, comprehensive logging, and admin-only access controls. Supports both individual movies and complete TV series with safe deletion including sidecar file cleanup.
overview: Detects and manages duplicate media items in Jellyfin libraries

versions.changelog:
Initial release (v0.1.0.0):
- Core duplicate detection engine for movies and TV series
- Advanced title normalization with sequel detection
- Configurable fuzzy matching with provider ID support
- Comprehensive exclusion system (library, path, glob patterns)
- Dry-run mode as default for safe operation
- Admin-only access with structured logging
- Foundation for scanning, planning, and deletion workflows
